pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of ICA Mixture Models // Provides R functions which facilitate the estimation of ICA mixture models. We have developed and implemented the NSMM-ICA algorithm that currently integrates npEM and Fast-ICA for non-parametric estimation of ICA mixture models (Zhu, X., Hunter, D.R., 2016 DOI:10.1080/10485252.2016.1225049 and Zhu, X., Hunter, D.R., 2015 arXiv:1510.08178). This is a new tool for unsupervised clustering.
